author: vors
body:
- Update map.json with AssemblyMetadataHelper.cs
- Add new file AssemblyMetadataHelper.cs from [SD:715912]
- Replace build.sh by Start-TypeGen. Remove CorePsTypeCatalog.cs from the repo

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I would probably have held on this, but it looks like the charges to the build were reverted.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
@andschwa sorry for not waiting for your review. 

This PR is needed to get us closer to the point when we can just copy SD sources and build Nano edition (without any changes). That's one of my goal with one-codebase.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: All right, just know that the parser is buggy currently.

title: TypeGen enhancements
